name: DURATECH 8" High Leverage Linemans Pliers, Cr-Ni Side Cutters, Linesman Pliers for Wire Cutting, Crimping
short_description: High-Leverage Design: Engineered with a forward-placed pivot point, this linemans pliers significantly alters the leverage, making gripping and cutting tasks more easier. Enjoy enhanced cutting efficiency with minimal effort required!
Comfortable Usage: This linesman pliers has a length of 8.7 inches and a weight of just 0.83 pounds. It meets ANSI standards, ensuring you get a reliable and safe tool for your projects.
Ergonomic Non-Slip Handles: The handles are designed for maximum comfort and grip for better control, making your tasks more precise and enjoyable
Durable Cr-Ni Alloy: Made from high-quality Cr-Ni alloy, this side cutters ensures high durability and excellent corrosion resistance, delivering long-lasting performance under demanding conditions

Versatile Multi-Functionality: This pliers is perfect for various applications, including gripping, holding, and cutting. Its versatility makes it an essential addition to any toolbox, whether for professional or DIY projects

name: Insulated Combination Lineman's Pliers 8-Inch, 1000V VDE Tested, Chrome Vanadium Steel, VDE-GS Certified
short_description: Insulated Combination Lineman's Pliers size 8 inches (200mm)

60CrNiMoV (CrV) Chrome vanadium steel drop forged, induction hardened body hardness HRC40-50, additional induction hardened for cutting edges and gripping surfaces hardness HRC55-65, surface electrophoretic black finishing and fine polished
1000V Insulated with dual color component handles VDE tested, VDE/GS certified
product_description: Combination plier size 8 inches (200mm) 60CrNiMoV (CrV) Chrome vanadium steel drop forged, induction hardened body hardness HRC40-50, additional induction hardened for cutting edges and gripping surfaces hardness HRC55-65, surface electrophoretic black finishing and fine polished 1000V Insulated with dual color component handles VDE tested, VDE/GS certified

name: 9 Inch 1000V Insulated Linesman Pliers - Multipurpose Combination With Wire Crimper/Stripper/Cutter, Heavy Duty Eccentric for Screwing, Crimping, Stripping, Shearing
short_description: Multipurpose Insulated Pliers: This insulated linemans pliers combines multiple functions, including clamping, fastening, winding, crimping, cutting, and wire stripping, all while emphasizing safety. Its 1000V high-voltage insulation design makes it an indispensable tool in various electrical operations, meeting diverse work requirements.

Safety Insulation: The handle of the insulated electrical pliers is made of TPE insulation material and has undergone rigorous 1000V voltage testing, providing users with safe protection in high-voltage environments. This ensures reliable safety during electrical work, reducing the risk of electric shock.

Durable Materials: The body of the insulated combination pliers is made of 55 steel, with a specialized blackening and water-grinding surface treatment. This not only ensures the tool’s hardness and durability but also provides excellent corrosion and rust resistance.

Precision and Efficiency: The wire stripping holes are designed with precision, suitable for various sizes of solid wires (10, 12, 14, 16, 18 AWG) and stranded wires (12, 14, 16, 18, 20 AWG), allowing for precise stripping without damaging the core. Additionally, the insulated electrical pliers feature an eccentric design, making operation effortless and improving work efficiency.

Wide Application: The durability, versatility, and safety of the insulated eccentric pliers make them an excellent choice for various tasks, such as home repairs, electrical maintenance, and circuit installation. For electricians and repair professionals, the 1000v insulating pliers can ensure both work efficiency and operational safety.

name: Fluke INCP8 Insulated Heavy Duty Combination Plier, 1000V
short_description: Heavy duty lineman combination pliers, with slim shape for better access to wires in tight spaces
Secure hold by aggressive serrated jaws and 4 point gripping hole
Powerful gripping jaw, yet 20 percent lighter weight than other designs
Forged from German chromium molybdenum vanadium steel
product_description: Insulated heavy duty lineman combination plier, 1000V.

name: KNIPEX Tools 98 62 02, Flat Nose Plastic Pliers 1000V Insulated, Orange
short_description: Constructed of fiberglass reinforced plastic
Fully insulated to reduce risk of short circuit
Handles have a soft plastic sone for better grip
Excellent for use in chemically aggressive environments
All insulated tools meet the requirements of ASTM F1505
product_description: Made In Wuppertal-Cronenberg, Germany. In Addition To Quality, Innovation And Performance, Other Important Cornerstones Are Sustainable Actions And Value-Guided Orientation.

name: Knipex 09 12 240 9.5-Inch Ultra-High Leverage Lineman's Pliers with Fish Tape Puller and Crimper
short_description: The rivet has been reduced in size and moved closer to the jaws to create an ultra-high leverage design for 25% easier cutting power
Features a universal terminal crimper and a fish tape puller on the backside
Serrated cross-hatched knurled gripping zone on the jaws for pulling and gripping
The recess on the back now has an oval shaped design which works better on thicker, round or oval shaped cable

Additional gripping zone below the joint for strong gripping of wires and pulling wires; precise induction hardened (64 HRC) cutting edges for long life and easy cutting of soft, hard and ACSR wire, dual component grips for added comfort.
product_description: KNIPEX Tools has completely redesigned our Lineman’s Pliers series to make them easier to cut with, saving you time and energy. The rivet has been reduced in size and moved closer to the jaws to create an ultra-high leverage design for 25% easier cutting power. Additionally, the recess on the back now has an oval shaped design which works better on thicker, round or oval shaped cable. The design also has created a great way to deburr conduit pipes; open the jaws slightly for a round shape and insert the conduit. This new lineman’s design is not only making this product more competitive in the market but it is going to become the new design to beat!

name: Klein Tools 89 Replacement Handles, Plastic Handle Replacement Set for 8 to 9-Inch Pliers , Red
short_description: Plastic replacement handles for slip-resistant grip and comfort
Fit these to an existing pair of 8-Inch (203 mm) to 9-Inch (229 mm) pliers
To install, place open end of grip in hot tap water to within one inch of plugged end for approximately one minute, drive grip onto pliers handle.
Made in USA
product_description: These Tenite-plastic grips handles provide comfort and resist slipping. Use hot tap water to fit these to an existing pair of 8-Inch (203 mm) to 9-Inch (229 mm) pliers. Plastic pliers handles for slip-resistant grip and comfort. Fits 8-Inch and 9-Inch pliers. Installs in about 1 minute using hot tap water. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: WEDO Insulated Pliers Set 3pcs, VED 1000V Electrician pliers Kit, Lineman Pliers 8”, Long Needle Nose Pliers 6”, Diagonal Cutting Pliers 6”, CR-V, Anti-Slip Handles
short_description: PRODUCT STANDARD: Insulated Pliers are produced according to IEC60900 Standard, and in accordance with Germany VDE Certification. Before ex-works delivery, all tools must pass 10000V AC test(10 times of the rated voltage).

DURABLE AND QUALITY: Insulated Pliers are Made of die-forged Vanadium Stainless Steel; Titanium plated surface; Rust-resistant; High Strength; Anti-burn, High & Low Temperature Resistant; Firm Structure, No Loosening, Displacement or Shedding.Jaw hardness is HRC 58-63.
INCLUDING: 1 x Lineman Pliers 8”, 1 x Long Needle Nose Pliers 6”, 1 x Diagonal Cutting Pliers 6”.

SAFETY DESIGN: INSULATED TOOLS ARE Single-head structure, Exposed metal part should be as little as possible, Flange on insulated handle, Insulation entirety, no crack or breakage, No joint gap between assembled insulated Tools.

Service: WEDO TOOLS has been highly praised by our new and old customers because of our user-friendly design concept, continuous improvement of excellent quality and after-sales services. To enhance customers’ satisfaction, we set up service centers in Germany, Russia, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, the United States, the united Arab emirates, in order to provide timely after-sales service.
